discourse_list.title: Starknet simple bridge - Launch date update

content.content: @Protocol-Engineering @Growth-Core-Unit , due to delay for greenlisting our Starknet contracts, we will be launching the simple bridge next week (the week of May 3rd, 2022)

Hi everyone, particularly looking at @Protocol-Engineering, @Growth-Core-Unit . We have cleared with Starknet that we can deploy the smart contracts safely this week. We will be working next week on testing the UI and will provide an update on this thread on the release of the UI then. I am available to answer any questions

@Growth-Core-Unit , @Protocol-Engineering , Starknet successfully launched Starkgate and the ETH bridge limit of $100k was very quickly hit. No front-end bugs to report, we are waiting for the Starkware team confirmation on Sunday. If positive we will be launching on Starkgate early next week.

pyramidmaker:  Starknet successfully launched Starkgate and the ETH bridge limit of $100k was very quickly hit.   They raised it again from 25ETH to 100ETH and it sold out quickly  BTW here’s a nice list of what’s available, or being worked-on, once you get to the other side: Notion – The all-in-one workspace for your notes, tasks, wikis, and databases.

@Protocol-Engineering @Growth-Core-Unit, we will be launching the mainnet bridge next week. The main front-end issues we had have been solved. In the meantime, if you would like to try the DAI bridge on Goerli, you can go to this link and select DAI. If you would like to get some Goerli DAI to run a test please DM me your address.

Very smooth and quick(max transfer allow is 5 DAI on Goerli Testnet), all completed within 5 minutes. Starknet → Ethereum obviously took longer (overnight). Looking forward to StarkGate adding DAI on Ethereum Mainnet! Thank you ser!
It will be there next week! Stay tuned for the May update, I’ll provide more visibility on next steps re: fast withdrawals, teleport on Starknet, and on our budget

@Growth-Core-Unit @Protocol-Engineering , DAI bridge on Starknet is now available on mainnet. You can go to the Starkgate interface and select DAI. Assure to accept terms to use your own wallet. If you click on “deposit to L2” on the top right of the screen without accepting terms,  it will only allow to deposit from a centralized exchange account Please get back to me if you have any feedback
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Update on the state of the bridge:   We have had between 150k DAI and 180k DAI in the bridge   The deposit limit was set at 50 DAI, which means we had 30k + deposits   The first ETHDAI pool has been launched on Starknet and it will be properly seeded with liquidity on September 5. We increased the deposit limit for that purpose   We are still in discussion with Starknet to understand their roadmap to increase their own ceilings. We will provide updates there as we learn more about timing
